chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: What's up guys, you are in the 11th video of the Sigma Web Development course.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: We have completed 10 videos.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So one like is enough for the consistency of all of us.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: In today's video, we will see about Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Because they are very important for SEO.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And to understand the structure of the overall website,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: search engines are very happy to see this structure.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: That means overall SEO of your website is going to be very good if you use these tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: What are these tags? Why are these tags?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: How to use them?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: What are the benefits? We will see in this video.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Intro

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So guys, I would like to tell you what are Semantic Tags?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Here you can see that I have made a folder named Video 11.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And here I have set the title by putting a boilerplate template of index.html.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: By putting an H1, I am going to set this image and preview it here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So this is the image.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: To explain a little, I will tell you what are Semantic Tags?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Semantic Tags are for browsers and web crawlers

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: who want to understand your website properly.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: They tell them what is the content of your website?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And what is the purpose of which place and which tag?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: If you don't use Semantic Tags in HTML,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: then your work will be done.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: It's not like if you don't use Semantic Tags,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: then your website won't look good.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You can do a good design.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: But we want to explain to Google and Bing search engines about our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And if we explain them about our website,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: then they will be able to understand our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And they will rank our website on Google, Bing, respective search engines.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And we want the crawlers to understand our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And we want whoever wants to understand our website to understand it well.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: That's why there are some special tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Like header, nav, main, article, figure.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: All these are special tags in HTML

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: which help in structuring your website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Now if there is something in the header, then I know that it is the header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: That is, it is at the top.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: If there is something in the footer, then I will understand that

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: the website has started ending from here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: This footer has started here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: This footer could also be div.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: But no, if I am using Semantic HTML,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: then I will use the footer tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Along with that, where I was making my navigation bar in the span tag,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: this time I will not make my navigation bar in the span tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: I will make my navigation bar in the nav tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So these kinds of differences explain our search engines very well

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: about what our website is about.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So I will show you some examples of semantic tags here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And I hope you understood what semantic tags are.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Now see, there are download folders like our computer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Many of you must have a download folder

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: that you have got all the files of the world in it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: 90% of the files of your computer are in the download folder of many people.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: But we should not do this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Some people go to such an extent that they start spreading files

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: in their local disk C, in the windows folder.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And some people keep files in system 32 too, friends.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So if you spread your files in your entire computer,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: then definitely it is not arranged in one way.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: But if you arrange it in folders,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: that you have this file in one folder.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: If you want to put a secret file in a folder,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: you put secret files.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You can make a folder called do not open disk.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: If you can put some of your files in it,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: then it will be arranged in one way.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You have arranged images in one way,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: you have arranged videos in one way,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: and you have arranged letters in one way,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: and you have arranged e-books in one way.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So whenever you go to find it, you will get it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So it will be much better for you to understand

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: that folder structure instead of

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: if you are spreading your files throughout the computer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You definitely don't want to spread your files throughout the computer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So I hope you understood why we use semantic tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: It is very good for our SEO.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So SEO is a word, I have not used it yet.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: But SEO is a very important part of search engine optimization.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Using semantic tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So what happens?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Basically, I make your website the way you make it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You just use some special tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: For example, let's say I am making this website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: What I will do now is I will comment this image here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: What are semantic tags?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: I will not comment this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: What I will do here is I will make a navbar.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So what I will do?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: First of all, I will say that this is the header of my website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: I have used a header tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: I will make a nav in it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: In this, I will make an unordered list.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: I will make an li in it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And I will write home here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And after that, let's say I am writing a lot like this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And this is my header like this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So anyone who comes to my website will understand that this is my header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Home, about, contact, whatever I want to write, I can write here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So this is my header, this is my navbar.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: This is clearly visible because I have used header and nav tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So I write about here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And I write contact here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So I wrote home here, I wrote about here, and I wrote contact here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So I hope you understood this thing.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Now if I want a footer, let's say I want to make a footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Here my main content will come after the header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So I will use the main tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And after that, my footer, let's say I write in the footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Copyright, CWH, and here I write all rights reserved.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Okay, I can write like this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So here, look, copyright, all rights reserved, I wrote all this here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Did I, uh, this, yes.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So what I will do is I will cut this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: I will put this in the main.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: This is my main content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So first my header will come, then the main content will come, then the footer will come.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: As you can see here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And here too, you see, here is the header, this is my main content, this is the footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So in one way, what I did is I arranged it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: In the same way, the way you arrange your files in different folders.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: I have arranged my HTML tags here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So we understood about the header tag that it is used to represent the top section of a web page.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Which is the header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Then after that, we put nav, which is the navigation menu on our page, in the nav tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Ideally, the article indicates a self-containing piece of content such as a blog post or news article.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: If you put a particular self-contained piece of content, then put it in the article tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Section represents a thematic grouping.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: That is, suppose one section is talking about one thing on your page.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Then the second section will talk about something else.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Aside, aside means if anything is lying on the side, then it is used as an aside tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So here you see, typically used for sidebars or content that is tangentially related to the main content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Like what you can do on the aside tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: That you have to put a side note, you have to put about the author.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You must have seen a lot of blogs in which the side is also written about the author.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So you can put such things in the aside tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Then after this we have the footer tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: I told you about this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: If you want to put copyright information or if you want to put some important links of the website, then you can put it in the footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Then after this, figure and fig caption.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: What is figure and fig caption?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Whenever you want to use images, diagrams, charts, etc., then you can use figure and fig caption.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: The main content area inside the main, like the main content area of ​​our page was this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: We put it in the main tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Then there is also a time tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Used to represent time-related information.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So you can use the time tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You can put date, time or anything in it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So I hope you understand this thing now.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So these are used to enhance SEO.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Accessibility is used to improve.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And if browsers want to make a decision about any of our pages.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: For example, a browser has a new feature that it will read our content aloud.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Like Edge has a feature.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So the browser can decide that I am only reading the main content aloud.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Now think about it, if someone wants to read this page aloud, then how will he read it aloud?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Code with Harry, Home, Courses, Tutorial.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You don't want to be allowed to read like this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You want the main content to be read.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: HTML, Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: HTML5 Introduce, Arrange, Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: The first versions of our HTML did not have semantic tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Semantic tags were introduced from HTML5.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: And the most important reason to introduce semantic tags in HTML5 is to arrange things.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So that the browser or whoever is parsing the content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Whoever is looking at the code of our content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Whether it is a browser, crawler, google, bing, search engines.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Or if anyone wants to generate a preview.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Like if you put a URL on Twitter, then it wants to generate a preview.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: If there are such things.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: You will want your content to be understood properly.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: So if you want your content to be understood properly.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Then you will use semantic tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Here this image is explaining very well.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: That without semantic tags, if you write HTML like this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: Then you will write semantic tags like this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: This image you are seeing.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: This is a header, this is a nav, this is a side.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #11
chunks.text: How to throw one thing in the side.

text: What's up guys, you are in the 11th video of the Sigma Web Development course. We have completed 10 videos. So one like is enough for the consistency of all of us. In today's video, we will see about Semantic Tags. Because they are very important for SEO. And to understand the structure of the overall website, search engines are very happy to see this structure. That means overall SEO of your website is going to be very good if you use these tags. What are these tags? Why are these tags? How to use them? What are the benefits? We will see in this video. Let's go to the computer screen. Let's roll the intro. Intro So guys, I would like to tell you what are Semantic Tags? Here you can see that I have made a folder named Video 11. And here I have set the title by putting a boilerplate template of index.html. By putting an H1, I am going to set this image and preview it here. So this is the image. To explain a little, I will tell you what are Semantic Tags? Semantic Tags are for browsers and web crawlers who want to understand your website properly. They tell them what is the content of your website? And what is the purpose of which place and which tag? If you don't use Semantic Tags in HTML, then your work will be done. It's not like if you don't use Semantic Tags, then your website won't look good. You can do a good design. But we want to explain to Google and Bing search engines about our website. And if we explain them about our website, then they will be able to understand our website. And they will rank our website on Google, Bing, respective search engines. And we want the crawlers to understand our website. And we want whoever wants to understand our website to understand it well. That's why there are some special tags. Like header, nav, main, article, figure. All these are special tags in HTML which help in structuring your website. Now if there is something in the header, then I know that it is the header. That is, it is at the top. If there is something in the footer, then I will understand that the website has started ending from here. This footer has started here. This footer could also be div. But no, if I am using Semantic HTML, then I will use the footer tag. Along with that, where I was making my navigation bar in the span tag, this time I will not make my navigation bar in the span tag. I will make my navigation bar in the nav tag. So these kinds of differences explain our search engines very well about what our website is about. So I will show you some examples of semantic tags here. And I hope you understood what semantic tags are. Now see, there are download folders like our computer.
